name: Stoical Domination
description:
A real-time-strategy, turn-based game.

 Build troops and send them to fight any opposing enemies. 

Be careful though, you only have so much time to complete your turn.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move camera (Put mouse on edge of screen also works)

Left click to select a troop

Right click to command a troop to a position

Drag click to mass select troops

How to play:

Click on crystals near base to earn currency.

Use currency to buy troops.

Use troops to fight.

Goal:

Destroy opposing base.
